installCommand: wget -q https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.3-stable.tar.xz -O flutter.tar.xz && tar -xf flutter.tar.xz && rm flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter doctor && flutter pub get
